oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A. Schwab Soap Advertisement
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brown-and-white advertising image proclaiming “Schwab’s Nature Soap For Baby And Adult Use Trade Mark Reg. U. S. Pat. Off.” with illustration of little girls head

“A. Schwab -- Established 1876 -- 163 Beale St. Memphis -- A replica of an advertising card used in the 1920’s. A. Schwab – the oldest business on Beale St. The store provides a nostalgic trip for the visitor into one of the last remaining working general stores in the South.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: A. Schwab; Beale Street; museums; stores; general stores; ads; Beale Street businesses;
